DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Insulin-like Growth Factor II elevate sufficiently detect Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia II ( CIN II ) , Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia III ( CIN III ) , cervical cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Serum IGF-II Cancer : Can IGF II Levels Used Monitor Screen Patients Specifically Cervical Cancer
DOC.criteria: Age 18 75 year Female Normal medical history Medical history single type cancer confirm biopsy equivalent criterion Squamous cell carcinoma organs cervix Adenocarcinoma Medical history inflammatory disease May pregnant Pap smear positive Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia II III Squamous cell cervical cancer confirm biopsy Informed consent Willingness submit blood sample venipuncture Willingness submit second blood sample necessary Age < 18 > 75 year Medical history cancer cervical cancer , Nonisletcell tumor hypoglycemia , Growth hormone deficiency , Acromegaly , Hepatoma , inflammatory disease addition confirm CIN cervical cancer
